Management

At Your
Service

We are the committed to empowering technology pioneers and developing the nation’s innovation economy.

Cyberview Shareholding Structure

True to the spirit of collaboration, our shareholders share our vision for growth and prosperity on a global scale. We are supported by the Malaysian Government and industry leaders with specific expertise in investments, development and technology. Together, we make up a team that is capable, experienced and confident – to make your dreams come true.

Cyberview Group Structure

Our vision is to transform Cyberjaya into a Global Tech Hub by making it a liveable Smart City. We achieve this through a strategic two pronged approach of garnering investments.

51%

Joint venture of Cyberview Sdn Bhd and Cofely Malaysia Sdn Bhd – a regional subsidiary of one of Europe’s premier and leading names for environmental and energy efficiency.

READ MORE
100%

Joint venture of Cyberview Sdn Bhd and Cofely Malaysia Sdn Bhd – a regional subsidiary of one of Europe’s premier and leading names for environmental and energy efficiency.

READ MORE

The Management Team

Going the Extra Mile for Your Business Solutions.

Tan Sri Dr. Mohd Irwan Serigar Abdullah Chairman

Tan Sri Dr. Mohd Irwan Serigar Abdullah

Chairmain

Tan Sri Dr. Mohd Irwan Serigar Abdullah, assumed the position of the Chairman on 1 November 2012.

Tan Sri Mohd Irwan holds a B.A. (Hons) Population Studies from University of Malaya, Kuala Lumpur in 1982, a M.Sc. in Energy, Management and Policy from University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, USA in 1994 and a Ph.D in Economics from International Islamic University, Kuala Lumpur in 2003. He was appointed to the Malaysian Administrative and Diplomatic Service (PTD) as Assistant Director, Regional Economics Division Economic Planning Unit, Prime Department, Kuala Lumpur in 1984. Tan Sri Mohd Irwan is still in the service, currently serving as Secretary General of Treasury, Ministry of Finance, Malaysia.

Aside from Cyberview Sdn Bhd, Tan Sri Mohd Irwan is also the Chairman for Kumpulan Wang Amanah Pencen (KWAP) and Chairman of Inland Revenue Board of Malaysia among others.
